item.title: Are Junior Developers in BIG TROUBLE With AI Usage?! - Dev Leader Weekly 97
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss the usage of AI for junior developers just getting started. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/06/07/are-junior-developers-in-big-trouble-with-ai-usage-dev-leader-weekly-97

item.title: The Hidden Cost of Being the Team Hero - Dev Leader Weekly 96
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss the trap of becoming a hero on the team and what you can do about it! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2025/05/31/the-hidden-cost-of-being-the-team-hero-dev-leader-weekly-96
